Segment.name: AOR
Segment.comment: To report observation results at the specified location

Field.name: ObservationDistribution
Field.comment: Identifies the distribution of an observation

Field.name: ObservationSeverity
Field.comment: A grading that describes the severity of the observation

Field.name: NeoplasmCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the description of a tumorous lesion

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue1
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval1
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue2
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval2
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue3
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval3
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval
